input_tables.name: mrr_sales_subscription
input_tables.fields:
id INT,
				sales_order_id INT,
				customer_id INT,
 				ad_id INT,
				stopped_at STRING,
 				expires_at STRING,
 				created_at STRING,
 				backorder_id INT,
 				expired_reason STRING,
 				remnant STRING,
				lock_version STRING,
 				quote_id INT,
 				expired_by STRING

input_tables.name: mrr_sales_subscription_price
input_tables.fields:
subscription_id INT,
                              promo_id INT,
                              unit_price INT,
                              starts_on STRING,
                              block_count INT
